page.title: 13WILMSLOW'S HALF MARATHON
page.content: The half_marathon comes to Wilmslow every year on 31 March. It runs through our area for most of the race. The maximum entrance is 2000. On average about 1200 finish (of all shapes and sizes). It costs Â£3 per person to enter. The committee, made up of Mr. N.Pringle, Dr. K.Mackay, Mr. H.Turner and Mr. K.Warmsley has organized the event for two years now and it is highly successful. The finish line is at the rugby club,which is out of our area. The fastest time for this 13 mile race,{63 {mins.}was run by a professional runner. The prizes are sponsored by a British Airline. The first prize is a holiday anywhere in the world. The thousands of pounds raised by this{charity}event are donated to Cancer Research.
